dialog.title: Claude Code Rate Limit
dialog.interrupted: {{source}} was interrupted due to usage limits.

swapInfo.proactiveMessage: Automatically switched from {{from}} to {{to}} before hitting rate limit.
swapInfo.reactiveMessage: Rate limit hit on {{from}}. Automatically switched to {{to}} and restarted.
swapInfo.operationStopped: The operation was stopped because {{profile}} reached its usage limit.
swapInfo.switchToAnother: Switch to another account below to continue.
swapInfo.addAnother: Add another Claude account to continue working.

upgrade.button: Upgrade to Pro for Higher Limits
upgrade.title: Upgrade for more usage
upgrade.description: Upgrade your Claude subscription for higher usage limits.

resetTime.weekly: Weekly limit - resets in about a week
resetTime.session: Session limit - resets in a few hours

profileSwitching.switchToAnother: Switch to another Claude account and retry the operation:
profileSwitching.addSubscription: Add another Claude subscription to automatically switch when you hit rate limits.
profileSwitching.openLogin: This will open Claude login to authenticate the new account.

whatHappened.title: What happened:
whatHappened.message: The {{source}} operation was stopped because your Claude account ({{profile}}) reached its usage limit.
whatHappened.switchOrAdd: You can switch to another account and retry, or add more accounts above.
whatHappened.addOrWait: Add another Claude account above to continue working, or wait for the limit to reset.

alerts.terminalOpened:
A terminal has been opened to authenticate "{{profileName}}".

Steps to complete:
1. Check the "Agent Terminals" section in the sidebar
2. Complete the OAuth login in your browser
3. The token will be saved automatically

Once done, return here and the account will be available.
alerts.addFailed: Failed to add profile. Please try again.
